website_summaries.verdict: It's got a sturdy design and features 3 well-made and fully functioning inserts for fruit, ice, and loose tea.
pros: The body and handle are strong, and its lid is very secure
The tea infuser is perfect for loose tea and it can be used with hot water
Because of its narrow design, it fits well on most refrigerator shelves
cons: The main complaint is that the spout is large, so pouring can take some getting used to

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pitcher! I did strawberry water first, then cumcumber water... I made it and let sit overnight , it was Delicious! Perfect! I am an ALL WATER person... this is So Great!!! I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: cookiesweikert

customer_reviews.title: Great all around pitcher!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today, I love it!! The pitcher is thin, so fits easily into the fridge. The three inserts are great! Using for sun tea...has a screen filtered basket that stays at the bottom of the water..I used tea bags, works fine, but loose tea would also work. The cap can be turned and liquid poured without having to remove the cap...I like that. Seals tightly when closed. Lightweight, balances well when pouring.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn DumondTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Happy Iced Tea Maker
customer_reviews.text: It was put right to use in this hot weather. I've made iced tea 3 days in a row. I love the options for frozen core, a diffuser for lemon and the tea holder as well. All work well. I'm especially happy with the amount it makes, I can serve several glasses full. It doesn't seem to pour unless I take the top off, unless I need direction of some kind. Overall, really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Teve

customer_reviews.title: Well designed infuser / pitcher
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this daily for over a month. It's super easy to fill the infuser. The slim design allows it to fit easily in a refrigerator door along with a gallon jug and a 1/2 gallon container of milk. I typically refill the water 2 or 3 times before changing the infusion. When I do change the infusion, I find it's important to remove the orange top and thoroughly clean each part. The smart design, multiple inserts and size make this a great addition to any kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: works well but concerns about cleaning properly
customer_reviews.text: I like it because I can experiment and Im getting cool results with different flavors. The jug is thin so it fits easily in the fridge. I see that it's one piece. It concerns me greatly that I cannot take it apart to clean it well as there are nooks you cannot get into. If it starts molding up like another reviewer mentioned, then I will be more concerned. But so far so good. I've had it less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Carefulshopper

customer_reviews.title: I received someones return! Scratches and beat up. Not new as described.
customer_reviews.text: what I received was NOT NEW. It was SOMEONES RETURN. The box was beat up and retaped. The contents inside had fingerprints and scratches all on the plastic. It came inside a sealed brown Amazon box so it left the facility like this....beat up. What I received is not new, it's a OPEN BOX item. I keep my kitchen items in the box when not in use. Debating whether to return it. Seems like a nicely designed pitcher otherwise. I could not give this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This pitcher is slender and slides nicely in the frig
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher is slender and slides nicely in the frig. It comes with 3 center inserts. One for fresh tea leaves, one for fruit and another to freeze. I have used all three. The fruit infusion center piece holds a good amount of fruit and vegetables. I also use the fruit infusion center piece for tea bags. It’s well made. I like the clarify of the clear plastic. Sometimes the plastic is cloudy but this is not. I hand wash it and don’t put in the dishwasher. I would definitely recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great infuser
customer_reviews.text: wanted to cut back on coffee and artifically sweet drinks, this is great, I LOVE this pitcher. easy to handle, I have bad hands and the lid is very easy for me to remove. very easy to clean wether you hand wash or use a dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Gambino

customer_reviews.title: Love The Water
customer_reviews.text: Started buying new flavored water called "Hint." It has a subtle fruit flavor, not sweetener nor carbonation. Only thing is it is expensive. This Core Fusion Water Pitcher allows the homeowner to make the exact same thing except with a much strong fruit flavor. First put an apple (Fuji) and navel orange slices with blackberries. It tasted great. Next was batch had watermelon and orange slices. Interestingly, the water had a cucumber flavor, but was very tasty and refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Jax Sage

customer_reviews.title: Great all-around infusion pitcher
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these as Christmas gifts, and both recipients are delighted with them! I'm planning on getting one for myself for making infused herbal iced teas and cucumber water for summer. Durable, easy to disassemble/reassemble for cleaning, fits perfectly in the fridge, and I love having three cores for ice, tea/coffee, and herbs/fruits/veggies. Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lemon water
customer_reviews.text: My parents love lemon water, so I bought this as a gift for them. They have so far enjoyed it and love the idea of trying other infusions! They have used the ice core for leaving the pitcher out while guests are visiting, and then put the fruit core back in place once they return the pitcher to the fridge. It’s great!
customer_reviews.author: mariel chandler

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and functionable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pitcher. Exactly what I was looking for, but elevated by the design. The fruit storage container holds quite a bit of fruit and seats into the lid allowing you to fill the pitcher by passing the water through the fruit. It also comes with a separate container for making tea and another for holding ice. Sturdy and slim with the brightly colored top, this pitcher looks and fits perfectly into my refrigerator. Would buy again and would definitely purchase as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: SGish

customer_reviews.title: Great and versatile pitcher!
customer_reviews.text: Great pitcher! I love this! I made sangria in it for a holiday celebration and it worked perfectly! I kept the cinnamon sticks in the "fruit" infusion container and had it in the fridge overnight. It washed out clean the next day very easily and no staining or smell! It also fits in the fridge nicely due to the slim profile. Looking forward to making a lot more in this pitcher! And I think I will purchase one for my friend's housewarming gift!
customer_reviews.author: Lila

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and easy to use! Makes water fun again!
customer_reviews.text: Opened this after xmas and used right away. Have been making cold brew iced teas with mixed frozen fruit in the diffuser to crack our family's soda habit. Its only been around 10 days so cant speak to longetivity but very well made and fits great in my small refrigerator. Would recommend as a gift if you need as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and durability
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher does what it says it does the only problem is when you put the strainer in it compromises the liquid that you get out of it. So you are constantly having to refill it. It is fairly easy to clean the strainer though can sometimes be hard especially when you use the tea strainer. I would recommend this product because it does what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a large pitcher to make fruit and veggie infused water to save money on buying bottled water. This is the perfect size for me, fits on top shelf of fridge and is easy to use. Nice quality and lid screws on so nothing tips out when pouring.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I really can't say enough good about the infusion pitcher
customer_reviews.text: I really can't say enough good about the infusion pitcher. I use it for infused teas and waters. I am kidney donor, to my son, and we need plenty of water. Adding vitamins and minerals makes it even more healthy.
customer_reviews.author: SSpencer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Like it but it's hard to control the amount of water when you pour the water out. I'm always worried I'm going to have the lid not tight enough and it's going to fall of when I'm pouring. Like the how easy it is to put in and out the fruit! 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Wolfpack

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pitcher, easy to use....
customer_reviews.text: Was happy with how quickly I received by Chef Inspirations 3 in 1 pitcher. Good size, easy to assemble and start using. I really like the 3 different inserts (tea, ice and fruit) and it's easy to wash. I didn't receive the instructions for the bonus infuser recipe ebook, but I just looked up great recipes on pinterest.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie K

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this product you know I usually just put strawberries or lemon and put it in the fridge and wait a couple hours and the waters really nice flavor. I totallyrecommend a product. It's a good size to fit in the fridge and I'll convenient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Marisela

customer_reviews.title: Well put together product
customer_reviews.text: Great for everyday use and a great versatile product. Love the ability to make infused water, tea or iced water. The fruit/vegetable infuser insert has too big of holes though. Would have been better if the holes were smaller to eliminate seeds floating around and passing through when pouring. Other than that it is durable and quick to take apart and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivery issues
customer_reviews.text: Although I believe I will very much enjoy this infuser, I actually bought it to give as a gift. There is a scratch on the pitcher, and the box is beat up and looks like it was wet at one point, I will not be able to wrap this one up as a gift. I am going to order another one and then will most likely keep this one for myself. Hopefully the new one comes in a timely way and in good condition. It looks like a five star item, but I gave it three stars because of the delivery issues.
customer_reviews.author: HMN

customer_reviews.title: 2 issues but still good item.
customer_reviews.text: Love the shape. The fruit basket "handle" which was cheap plastic, broke in half with the very first use. Not a big enough issue to send back. Don't like the inner rim which keeps a certain amount of liquid from pouring out at all. That needs to be fixed. Beyond that, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: donna c. lamb

customer_reviews.title: great tasting water
customer_reviews.text: I like it over all. The design makes it hard to completely empty ,because of the rim inside . A long handle sponge would help clean the inside.
customer_reviews.author: cher

customer_reviews.title: Glowing praise.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that is not the disaster some people thought. It is sturdy and easy to clean as long as a person unscrews and removes the plastic top. The shape is nice too, fitting easily in most parts of the fridge. And, the fact it is BRIGHT orange is an added benefit. I'm glad I live in Texas where the color is ubiquitous. I did not give it a perfect score because I haven't had it long enough to determine that.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied for sure.
customer_reviews.text: So far I love the pitcher. I plan on owning 6 of them by the end of February. Currently have 4 of them and I use them quite heavily. As I drink a ton of watter. Now, I was going to leave this at a four star, but the company did contact me over a broken fruit tube I got and are replacing it. They even chatted with me and seem very nice. It's a wonderful pitcher and well worth the buy for me. I plan to continue using them for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kal-Daka Wolfie

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher comes with an infusion accessory for loose tea, for fruit or tea bags, and an ice ore to keep the beverage cold after brewing. It has an attractive design and would be a nice gift along with some loose tea.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: I love this pitcher
customer_reviews.text: I love this pitcher. I drink water all day and now that I am infusing it, I enjoy it so much more. My only issue is this does not fit on my fridge shelf. It is very tall. I had to put it on the door.
customer_reviews.author: D. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pitcher
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice pitcher. I just wish it would fit somewhere other than the door of my refrigerator. I do like the versatility of the 3 "cores" that fit in the pitcher. I do think this will help me drink more water and that will be a good thing! The pitcher and all components seem to be well constructed. Would recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Sharintexas

customer_reviews.title: works great but the pouring spout not so mucm....
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job infusing the water, but trying to pour out the water into a cup, no so much.. You have to unscrew the top because barely any water comes out if you don't. So not really convenient or user friendly..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: simply using this product has helped me avoid the sugary drinks.

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: The plastic pitcher feels thin/flimsy and starts growing mold/mildew quickly. For us, it happened after only the second use (we tried infusing water with strawberries, blueberries, and pineapple). This product would be tremendously better if it was made out of glass. It might work fine for tea, but I don't recommend it for fresh fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love it and goes well with my diet. Easy to use so I gifted another for my sister.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: I’m not saying don’t buy it....
customer_reviews.text: This product isn’t bad. But don’t expect too much. The lid/pouring function is frustrating. It does it’s job with the infusion parts and tea steeper, but it still failed to impress.
customer_reviews.author: DNice

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for healthy beverages
customer_reviews.text: Rather than buying the fruit, tea or vegetable juice with lots of sugar and other additives, you can make your own natural beverage with your favorite fruit and vegetables and no sugar. It's a great way to help lower the level of sugar one consumes on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Diana M. Alviggi

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Use everyday to make homemade raspberry lemon iced tea.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Clanton

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty and we have been using it with limes/lemons and ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty and we have been using it with limes/lemons and cucumbers. A nice way to drink water. Have not yet tried to make iced tea but will do so one of these days
customer_reviews.author: axl

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: A piece of the infuser basket broke a few days after using it, not very durable but I can still use it. Probably won’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy  customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pitcher
customer_reviews.text: I love this pitcher!! Perfect size, and the larger infusions are hard to get! Perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.author: nic

customer_reviews.title: pretty good, just be warned infusioning apples in the ...
customer_reviews.text: pretty good , just be warned infusioning apples in the ebook that came with this says 8 hours it takes 24 hours n realy dowes not taste good but its great at making cucumber water havent tryed anything else hoping strawberrys dont take do ;long
customer_reviews.author: glyth

customer_reviews.title: Good for gifts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sisters mom and I'm so happy with it! She hasn't been able to actually use it but I love how it looks and I hope she likes it. I might have to buy one for myself as well
customer_reviews.author: Jasive

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this purchase. I make cold brewed tea at least twice a week and this makes it very easy. Will try the fruit water come summer, lots of options. Good product at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: LisaK

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying my homemade raspberry water. I use frozen organic fruit to put in the tube. I'm buying another one in case this one breaks in a few years. It's not flimsy at all but I think I'd really miss it if my clumsy self did something to it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia W.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy your infusion water 😀
customer_reviews.text: This is like being at the “spa”. Very yummy infused water has me drinking more water than ever. So easy to throw all sorts of concoctions together for a fun and special thirst quench.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great tea and fruit infuser
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher is wonderful. I love the tea infuser and also the fruit infuser. I am now drinking more water that before.
customer_reviews.author: Travelin Gal

customer_reviews.title: Love the infuser
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I love the tea infuser. The only thing I would have liked is instructions and maybe some recipes. The shipping label covered box instructions on box and wouldn't come off. I also sent one to each of my two daughters.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Delodder

customer_reviews.title: just started making infused water and so far love this pitcher
customer_reviews.text: just started making infused water and so far love this pitcher. It is easy to use, easy to clean and perfect size for my refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: vegasheat

customer_reviews.title: Price durability craftmanship
customer_reviews.text: Bought to gift at a baby shower durability craftmanship price

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Pitcher - A must have
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher is fantastic. The price and quality are outstanding. I have one and I've given many as gifts and will give more as gifts in the future. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: mminternet

customer_reviews.title: Great infusion pitcher
customer_reviews.text: I love this pitcher! So far my favorite is mint infused water. I will be recommending it to my friends and family

customer_reviews.title: Good buy but wish it was cuter
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was cuter but it gets the job done and fits in my fridge. Rly like this.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pitcher!! It allows me to make delicious fruit infused beverages.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t leak, works great for infused water!

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, fun, inventive , interesting.

customer_reviews.title: Great for drinks

customer_reviews.title: Coolest item

customer_reviews.title: I really like this and use it often
customer_reviews.text: Once the water level gets low (maybe at 1/4 full), it's a pain to pout out because of the top's design. Other than that, I really like this and use it often!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use the pitcher for infused water and I love it! It’s easy to use and works great! The only thing I would change is the color of the top, would be nice to have some options besides orange.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use... Doesn't let you know whether you can put hot liquids in it but I've been able to put warm liquids for the tea infuser.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it buy it
customer_reviews.text: Great concept I love infused water and tea works great

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: They're working great and helping me to drink more water
customer_reviews.text: 5 Stars – Ordered 3 of these, 2 for home and 1 for my office. The order arrived quickly and the items are as expected. They're working great and helping me to drink more water! SCORE!

customer_reviews.title: Nice pitcher for fruit infused water
customer_reviews.text: Great pitcher, I wish it was a little larger. The only downside is the interior collar/lip at the top of the pitcher, which is hard to clean.

customer_reviews.title: A+Quality especially for the price

customer_reviews.text: This works very well. So far, I've made infused pineapple and strawberry water. Both tasted great.

product_meta.title: Chef’s INSPIRATIONS 3 Core Infusion Water Pitcher. 3 Quart (2.8 Liters). Best For Flavored Infused Tea, Fruit or Herbs. Includes 3 Inserts for Fruit, Tea & Ice. Bonus Infuser Recipe eBook.
product_meta.description:
"This is what I've been looking for! It works perfect for my family. The fruit stays feed and it's big enough to quench everyone's thirst. We used it for our family cookout thus past weekend. I would definitely recommend this product." 
by B WIlliams

 Create Great Tasting Fruit, Tea or Herb Infused Beverages At Home With Ease!

 The Chef’s INSPIRATIONS 3 in 1 infusion pitcher comes with 3 inserts: 

1. Hollow rod, so you can add fruit, vegetables or herbs. 
2. Tea infuser – ideal for tea and smaller herbs and spices. 
3. Ice core. Simply fill with water and freeze. Great for chilling your favorite drinks without diluting the flavors.

How to create fruit infused water.

 Simply add your favorite fruit, vegetable, tea or herbs into the infuser, screw the rod to the lid, add water (could be hot or cold), wait a few minutes and serve... it's that simple!

This is a great way for you and your family to stay hydrated drinking refreshing infused water. Your children will love it too... it's a great alternative to high sugar soft drinks and juices.

 Made with BPA-free crystal clear shatterproof Tritan Plastic.

Includes free bonus fruit infuser recipe eBook to get you started. This eBook is exclusive to Chef's INSPIRATIONS and can't be found anywhere else (sent via email and instructions on pitcher box).

Perfect as a gift for the Thanksgiving or Christmas!

★100% Risk Free Guarantee. Don't decide now, give the Chef’s INSPIRATIONS 3 in 1 Infusion Pitcher a try...if the Chef’s INSPIRATIONS 3 in 1 Infusion Pitcher doesn’t live up to your high expectations we will refund your money back no questions asked!

"Awesome product! Perfect for the summer BBQs coming up!" 
by Amazon Customer
feature_bullets: CREATE HEALTHY & REFRESHING FRUIT, TEA OR HERB INFUSED beverages with this gorgeous 3 quart, 3 in 1 infuser water pitcher. STAY HYDRATED. Now you and your family can stay hydrated and banish high calorie sugary drinks for good.
NON SPILL LID. Take your infused water out and about with you because the lid seals tightly and nothing will spill.

BEAUTIFUL CRYSTAL CLEAR BPA FREE SHATTERPROOF TRITAN PLASTIC PITCHER. Includes 3 inserts for fruit (vegetables and herbs), tea and an ice core so you can cool your favorite drinks without diluting the flavors.
FITS MOST REFRIGERATOR DOORS AND EASY TO CLEAN. Simply hand wash with a non-abrasive cleaning sponge and you're done!
BACKED BY OUR 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE. If you're unhappy with this product in any way we will refund your money back no questions asked!
